title: Rate for magnetic field changes to induce current

content.prompt: The circular wire loop shown above has resistance 30 ùõÄ and area 3.0 m2, and is fixed in position in the plane of the page. A uniform magnetic field B is directed perpendicularly into the plane of the page. The constant rate at which the magnetic field would have to change in order to induce a current of 1.0 mA in this loop is most nearly

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
